Bluetooth1
Open file Settings
- Bluetooth is on Bluetooth disconnected Bluetooth connected to
BLE is not supported BLE is not ready for data transfer. Please wait until the status changes to "Connected to"
- Error occurred when creating parent directory Error occurred when saving data
- This app needs Bluetooth and your device does not support it. Please consult your device provider. OK
- This app needs Bluetooth to run. Press connect to instantiate connection again or press exit to quit. Connect Exit
- This apps need external storage to save data. Please check if it is available.
- \"%1$s\" file name already exists. Please enter another one.
- Send
Connecting... Connected to %1$s Not connected Disconnected
- scanning for devices... select a device to connect No devices have been paired No devices found Paired Devices Other Available Devices Scan for devices
-
Cannot find devices The app needs the coarse location access to discover devices.\nPress OK to set the permission at the App\'s setting screen.
Cannot save data The app needs write storage permission to save data.\nPress OK to set the permission at the App\'s setting screen. Cannot open file The app needs read storage permission to open file.\nPress OK to set the permission at the App\'s setting screen. NO THANKS
